full_summary:
# Request for Information for Land Command Support System (LCSS) Fielding Services

## Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is soliciting feedback from Indigenous vendors on a proposed Request for Proposal (RFP) for LCSS fielding services at Canadian Forces Base Valcartier.

## Call for Indigenous Vendors
The department aims to inform and engage with Indigenous vendors and obtain their input and feedback on potential requirements for a future procurement process.

## Background
The Department of National Defence requires contracted resources to augment the capacity of CFB Valcartier to perform LCSS fielding tasks in a timely manner. Specifically, the contracted resources would assemble and install various equipment into in-service Canadian military platforms.

## Key Requirements

* Performance of LCSS fielding tasks
* Assembly and installation of equipment into in-service Canadian military platforms

## Response Information
Vendors are invited to provide feedback and information on the proposed procurement process and any related requirements. This information will be used to inform the development of the RFP.

## Contact Information
For additional information, please contact:
Joshua Kaine
Supply and Procurement Services Branch
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
joshua.kaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
## Request for Proposal
The department will be issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the LCSS fielding services. The RFP will be available on the Canadian Government's tendering platform, Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

**Important Documents**

* Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) – Request for Information (RFI) Document
* Request for Proposal (RFP) Document

**Tender Information**

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-11 at 14:00:00 Eastern Time
* Tender URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17064085?extsite=MTcwNjQwODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
